Row.Text: Our people are now practicing your liturgies and donating their money to your Church. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

Ours is a state conceived of piety and virtue, and for ages past the Papal States have maintained its God-fearing reverence. It is time that we declare ourselves the Kingdom of God on Earth, and truly make our authority on matters of faith known throughout the world.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Papal States [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have founded a religion [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Religious unity must be at least 90% (religious unity is currently {1_Unity}%) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{3_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive two free Disciples [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your empire becomes known as the Kingdom of God

Ours is a state conceived of piety and virtue, and for ages past the Papal States have maintained it's God-fearing reverence. It is time that we declare ourselves the Kingdom of God on Earth, and truly make our authority on matters of faith known throughout the world.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive two free Disciples [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your empire becomes known as the Kingdom of God
Pius IX has declared the Papal States to be the Kingdom of God on Earth.

Heretics and Heathens, Infidels and Blasphemers! These wretches infest this world like a plague, and have diluted the message of our Holy Mother Church. Let us make it our active mission to counter the false words being spread throughout the world by institutionalising the Society of Jesus and its members; the Jesuits.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Papal States [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have founded a religion [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All religions must have been founded [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% of your [ICON_CITIZEN] Population is converted to your {2_ReligionType} each turn

Heretics and Heathens, Infidels and Blasphemers! These wretches infest this world like a plague, and have diluted the message of our Holy Mother Church. Let us make it our active mission to counter the false words being spread throughout the world by institutionalising the Society of Jesus and its members; the Jesuits[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% of your [ICON_CITIZEN] Population is converted to your {2_ReligionType} each turn
Pius IX of the Papal States has instituted the Society of Jesus to counter mass heresies throughout the world.

High-ranking members of our faith have begun to fall into discord with the Holy Mother Church, and their loyalty to Our Papal ring have been put to question. One of our - ahem - good friends has put to us a novel idea that would ensure the loyalty of our elite. It shall be a great banquet of debachuery, and all acts of sin and vice committed by the clergy shall be recorded for the good keeping of Our Holy Office.[NEWLINE]

We have funded the Banquet of Chestnuts, and have tallied the sins of our religious elite. Should they ever think of crossing us, their sins will be made public, and their family name permanently scarred.
We have decided against funding the Banquet of Chestnuts.

Foul blasphemies permeate {1_CityName} like a plague and it weakens the image of our Holy Mother Church. One of our religious elite have proposed an inqusition upon the city, to cleasnse away the vestiges of filth and sin that riddle that befoul it.[NEWLINE]
I cannot spare Church funds on this Inqusition.
Yes, this city must be cleansed.
We have declined to fund an inqusition into the city of {1_CityName}.
We have agreed to fund an inqusition into the city of {1_CityName}, and have cleansed the city of its heresies.
